doc.title: Intimacy
doc.plot: INTIMACY, laughs at how gadgets new and old enhance our lives by inexorably distracting from the now. Two friends try their best to engage in basic conversation, and as an afternoon hang out gets hung up, Andrea and Finch attempt to single out each other's signals among a technological four-some turned five-some. Whether modern static is interfering with the social connection or reaching out to a broader network, it's clear that the interpersonal experience may never be the same.
